text: Parasalvazaon apicicorne is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Parasalvazaon. It was described by Breuning in 1958.Biolib.cz - Parasalvazaon apicicorne. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1958 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Parasalvazaon
